Pilots.Name: Academy Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: Developed by Sienar Fleet Systems, the Empire used the fast and agile TIE in as its primary starfighter throughout most of the Galactic Civil War.

Pilots.Name: Obsidian Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: The TIE fighter's Twin Ion Engine system was designed for speed, making the TIE one of the most maneuverable starships ever produced.

Pilots.Name: Black Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: The TIE fighter has no shields or life support systems, forcing TIE pilots to depend solely on their skills to survive.

Pilots.Name: Night Beast
Pilots.PilotAbility: After executing a green manoeuvre, you may perform a free focus action.

Pilots.Name: Winged Gundark
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking at Range 1, you may change 1 of your ^HIT results to a ^CRITICAL result.

Pilots.Name: Backstabber
Pilots.PilotAbility: After executing a green manoeuvre, you may perform a free focus action.

Pilots.Name: Dark Curse
Pilots.PilotAbility: When defending, ships attacking you cannot spend focus tokens or reroll attack dice.

Pilots.Name: Mauler Mithel
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking at Range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.

Pilots.Name: Howlrunner
Pilots.PilotAbility: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking with its primary weapon, it may reroll 1 attack die.

Pilots.Name: Delta Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: In addition to its four laser cannons and warhead launchers, the TIE Defender came equipped with ion cannons in its upper wing.

Pilots.Name: Onyx Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: The TIE defender outclassed all other starfighters of its time, though its size and array of weapons greatly increased its weight and cost in credits.

Pilots.Name: Countess Ryad
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you reveal a ^STRAIGHT manoeuvre, you may treat it as a ^K-TURN manoeuvre.

Pilots.Name: Maarek Stele
Pilots.PilotAbility: When your attack deals a faceup Damage card to the defender, instead draw 3 Damage cards, choose 1 to deal and discard the others.

Pilots.Name: Colonel Vessery
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking, immediately after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a target lock on the defender if it already has a red target lock token.

Pilots.Name: Rexlar Brath
Pilots.PilotAbility: After you perform an attack that deals at least 1 Damage card to the defender, you may spend a focus token to flip those cards faceup.

Pilots.Name: Omicron Group Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: Noted for its triwing design, the Lambdaclass shuttle served a ^CRITICAL role as a light utility craft in the Imperial Navy.

Pilots.Name: Captain Yorr
Pilots.PilotAbility: When another friendly ship at Range 12 would receive a stress token, if you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may receive that token instead.

Pilots.Name: Colonel Jendon
Pilots.PilotAbility: At the start of the Combat Phase, you may assign 1 of your blue target lock tokens to a friendly ship at Range 1 if it does not have a blue target lock token.

Pilots.Name: Captain Kagi
Pilots.PilotAbility: When an enemy ship acquires a target lock, it must lock onto your ship if able.

Pilots.Name: Bounty Hunter
Pilots.PilotAbility: Originally intended as a prisoner transport, the Firespray patrol craft features a versatile weapons array and heavy armor plating.

Pilots.Name: Krassis Trelix
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may reroll 1 attack die.

Pilots.Name: Kath Scarlet
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking, the defender receives 1 stress token if he cancels at least 1 ^CRITICAL result.

Pilots.Name: Boba Fett
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you reveal a bank maneuver (^LEFTBANK or ^RIGHTBANK), you may rotate your dial to the other bank maneuver of the same speed.

Pilots.Name: Patrol Leader
Pilots.PilotAbility: To be granted command of a VT-49 Decimator was seen as a significant promotion for a middling officer of the Imperial Navy.

Pilots.Name: Captain Oicunn
Pilots.PilotAbility: After executing a maneuver, each enemy ship you are touching suffers 1 damage.

Pilots.Name: Commander Kenkirk
Pilots.PilotAbility: If you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to you, increase your agility value by 1.

Pilots.Name: Rear Admiral Chiraneau
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking at Range 1-2, you may change one of your ^FOCUS results to a ^CRITICAL result.

Pilots.Name: "Omega Leader"
Pilots.PilotAbility: Enemy ships that you have locked cannot modify any dice when attacking you or defending against your attacks.

Pilots.Name: "Zeta Leader"
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking, if you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to roll 1 additional attack die.

Pilots.Name: "Epsilon Ace"
Pilots.PilotAbility: While you do not have any Damage cards, treat your pilot skill value as "12."

Pilots.Name: Omega Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: To attain a coveted position in the skilled Omega squadron, pilots had to demonstate both their exceptional skill and their unwavering dedication to the First Order.

Pilots.Name: Zeta Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: The fragility of TIE fighters during the Galactic Civil War led engineers to improve survivability, resulting in a more durable starfighter.

Pilots.Name: Epsilon Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: Following the tradition of the Galactic Empire, the First Order has kept the TIE fighter design in service, but has updated the craft to modern combat standards.

Pilots.Name: "Fel's Wrath"
Pilots.PilotAbility: When the number of damage cards assigned to you equals or exceeds your hull value, you are not destroyed unti the end of the round.

Pilots.Name: Lieutenant Lorrir
Pilots.PilotAbility: When performing a barrel roll action, you may receive 1 stress token to use the 1  ^RIGHTBANK or ^LEFTBANK  template instead of the 1 ^STRAIGHT template.

Pilots.Name: Kir Kanos
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may spend 1 evade token to add one ^HIT result to your roll.

Pilots.Name: Kir Kanos
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you reveal a ^K-TURN manoeuvre you may treat the speed of that manoeuvre as "1", "3" or "5"

Pilots.Name: Turr Phennir
Pilots.PilotAbility: After you perform an attack, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

Pilots.Name: Soontir Fel
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you receive a stress token, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

Pilots.Name: "Deathfire"
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you reveal your manoeuvre dial or after you perform an action, you may perform a BOMB Upgrade card action as a free action.

Pilots.Name: Captain Jonus
Pilots.PilotAbility: When another friendly ship at Range 1 attacks with a secondary weapon, it may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

Pilots.Name: Tormax Bren
Pilots.PilotAbility: Once per round, after you discard an ^ELITEPILOTTALENT Upgrade card flip that card faceup.

Pilots.Name: Major Rhymer
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may increase or decrease the weapon range by 1 to a limit of Range 1-3.

Pilots.Name: Lieutenant Colzet
Pilots.PilotAbility: At the start of the End phase, you may spend a target lock you have on an enemy ship to flip 1 random facedown Damage card assigned to it faceup.

Pilots.Name: Commander Alozen
Pilots.PilotAbility: At the start of the Combat phase, you may acquire a target lock on an enemy ship at Range 1

Pilots.Name: Zertik Storm
Pilots.PilotAbility: Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot add their range combat bonus when attacking.

Pilots.Name: Maarek Stele
Pilots.PilotAbility: When your attack deals a faceup Damage card to the defender, instead draw 3 Damage cards, choose 1 to deal, and discard the others.

Pilots.Name: Juno Eclipse
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you reveal your manoeuvre, you may increase or decrease its speed by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

Pilots.Name: Darth Vader
Pilots.PilotAbility: During your "Perform Action" step, you may perform 2 actions.

Pilots.Name: "Duchess"
Pilots.PilotAbility: While you have the 'Adaptive Ailerons' Upgrade card equipped, you may choose to ignore its card ability.

Pilots.Name: "Pure Sabacc"
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking. If you have 1 or fewer Damage cards, roll 1 additional attack die.

Pilots.Name: "Countdown"
Pilots.PilotAbility: When defending, if you are not stressed during the "Compare Results" step, you may suffer 1 damage to cancel all dice results. if you do, receive 1 stress token.

Pilots.Name: Sigma Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: The primary result of a hidden research facility on Imdaar Alpha, the TIE phantom added a small fighter with cloaking capabilities to the Imperial fleet.

Pilots.Name: Shadow Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: Featuring a hyperdrive and shields, the TIE phantom also came equipped with five laser cannons, giving it unprecedented firepower for such a small Imperial fighter.

Pilots.Name: "Echo"
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you decloak, you must use the [ ^LEFTBANK 2] or [ ^RIGHTBANK 2] template instead of the [ ^STRAIGHT 2] template.

Pilots.Name: "Whisper"
Pilots.PilotAbility: After you perform an attack that hits, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

Pilots.Name: Starkiller Base Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: The Upsilon-class shuttle served as a command ship for many of the First Order's elite officers and agents as they spread terror across the galaxy.

Pilots.Name: Lieutenant Dormitz
Pilots.PilotAbility: During setup, friendly ships may be placed anywhere in the play area at Range 1-2 of you.

Pilots.Name: Major Stridan
Pilots.PilotAbility: For the purpose of your actions and Upgrade cards, you may treat friendly ships at Range 2-3 as being at Range 1.

Pilots.Name: Kylo Ren
Pilots.PilotAbility: The first time you are hit by an attack each round, assign the "I'll Show You the Dark Side" Condition card to the attacker.

Pilots.Name: Zeta Specialist
Pilots.PilotAbility: Only the most elite pilots of the First Order were authorized to fly this specialized two-seater TIE craft outfitted with enhanced shields, weapons, and sensor systems.

Pilots.Name: Omega Specialist
Pilots.PilotAbility: Only the most elite pilots of the First Order were authorized to fly this specialized two-seater TIE craft outfitted with enhanced shields, weapons, and sensor systems.

Pilots.Name: "Backdraft"
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking a ship inside your auxiliary firing arc, you may add 1 ^CRITICAL result.

Pilots.Name: "Quickdraw"
Pilots.PilotAbility: Once per round, when you lose a shield token, you may perform a primary weapon attack.

Pilots.Name: Sienar Test Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: Sienar Fleet System's TIE Advanced v1 was a groundbreaking starfighter design featuring upgraded engines, a missile launcher, and folding s-foils.

Pilots.Name: Baron of the Empire
Pilots.PilotAbility: The aristocratic title of baron was presented to ace starfighter pilots for outstanding service to the Empire.

Pilots.Name: Valen Rudor
Pilots.PilotAbility: After defending, you may perform a free action.

Pilots.Name: The Inquisitor
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking with your primary weapon at Range 2-3, treat the range of the attack as Range 1.

Pilots.Name: Cutlass Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: The TIE Punisher built upon the success of the TIE bomber, adding shielding, a second bomb chute, and three additional ordnance pods, each equipped with a twin ion engine.

Pilots.Name: Black Eight Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: Darth Vader's hand-picked Black Eight Squadron earned its reputation for ruthlessness when its bombardment of Callos rendered the planet uninhabitable.

Pilots.Name: "Deathrain"
Pilots.PilotAbility: When dropping a bomb, you may use the front guides of your ship. After dropping a bomb, you may perform a free barrel roll action.

Pilots.Name: "Redline"
Pilots.PilotAbility: You may maintain 2 target locks on the same ship. When you acquire a target lock, you may acquire a second lock on that same ship.

Pilots.Name: Raider-Class Corvette (Aft)
Pilots.PilotAbility: The demise of the Death Star proved to Imperial High Command the importance of anti-fighter craft which renewed interest in the Raider-class corvette.

Pilots.Name: Raider-Class Corvette (Fore)
Pilots.PilotAbility: Once per round, after you perform a primary weapon attack, you may spend 2 energy to perform another primary weapon attack.

Pilots.Name: Gemmer Sojan
Pilots.PilotAbility: While you are at Range 1 of at least 1 enemy ship, increase your agility value by 1.

Pilots.Name: Arvel Crynyd
Pilots.PilotAbility: You may declare an enemy ship inside your firing arc that you are touching as the target of your attack.

Pilots.Name: Jake Farrell
Pilots.PilotAbility: After you perform a focus action or are assigned a focus token, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

Pilots.Name: Tycho Celchu
Pilots.PilotAbility: You may perform actions even while you have a stress token.

Pilots.Name: Braylen Stramm
Pilots.PilotAbility: After you execute a manoeuvre, you may roll an attack die. On a ^HIT or ^CRITICAL result, remove 1 stress token from your ship.

Pilots.Name: Thane Kyrell
Pilots.PilotAbility: After an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 attacks another friendly ship, you may perform a free action.

Pilots.Name: Shara Bey
Pilots.PilotAbility: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 is attacking, it may treat your blue target lock tokens as its own.

Pilots.Name: Norra Wexley
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking or defending, you may spend a target lock you have on the enemy ship to add 1 ^FOCUS result to your roll.

Pilots.Name: "Zeb" Orrelios
Pilots.PilotAbility: When defending, you may cancel ^CRITICAL results before ^HIT results.

Pilots.Name: Ezra Bridger
Pilots.PilotAbility: When defending, if you are stressed, you may change 2 of your ^FOCUS results to ^EVADE results.

Pilots.Name: Sabine Wren
Pilots.PilotAbility: Immediately before you reveal your manoeuvre, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

Pilots.Name: Hera Syndulla
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you reveal a green or red manoeuvre, you may rotate your dial to another manoeuvre of the same difficulty.

Pilots.Name: Nera Dantels
Pilots.PilotAbility: You can perform ^TORPEDO secondary weapon attacks at ships outside your firing arc.

Pilots.Name: Ibtisam
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking or defending, if you have at least one stress token, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

Pilots.Name: Keyan Farlander
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking, you may remove 1 stress token to change all of your ^FOCUS results to ^HIT results.

Pilots.Name: Ten Numb
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking, 1 of your ^CRITICAL results cannot be cancelled by defense dice.

Pilots.Name: Etahm A'baht
Pilots.PilotAbility: When an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 is defending, the attacker may change 1 of its ^HIT results to a ^CRITICAL result.

Pilots.Name: Corran Horn
Pilots.PilotAbility: At the start of the End phase, you may perform 1 attack. You may not attack next round.

Pilots.Name: Roark Garnet
Pilots.PilotAbility: At the start of the combat phase choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1-3. Until the end of the phase, treat that pilot's pilot skill value as 12.

Pilots.Name: Kyle Katarn
Pilots.PilotAbility: At the start of the Combat Phase, you may assign 1 of your focus tokens to another friendly ship at Range 1-3.

Pilots.Name: Jan Ors
Pilots.PilotAbility: When another friendly ship at Range 1-3 is attacking, if you have no stress tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to allow that ship to roll 1 additional attack die.

Pilots.Name: Warden Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ability

Pilots.Name: Guardian Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ability

Pilots.Name: Esege Teketu
Pilots.PilotAbility: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 is attacking, it may treat your focus tokens as its own.

Pilots.Name: Miranda Doni
Pilots.PilotAbility: Once per round when attacking, you may either spend 1 shield to roll 1 additional attack die or roll 1 fewer attack die to recover 1 shield.

Pilots.Name: "Zeb" Orrelios
Pilots.PilotAbility: When defending, you may cancel ^CRITICAL results before ^HIT results.

Pilots.Name: Captain Rex
Pilots.PilotAbility: After you perform an attack, assign the "Suppressive Fire" Condition card to the defender.

Pilots.Name: Sabine Wren
Pilots.PilotAbility: Immediately before you reveal your manoeuvre, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

Pilots.Name: Ahsoka Tano
Pilots.PilotAbility: At the start of the Combat phase, you may spend 1 focus token to choose a friendly ship at Range 1. It may perform 1 free action.

Pilots.Name: Blue Squadron Novice
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ability

Pilots.Name: Jess Pava
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking or defending, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each other friendly ship at Range 1.

Pilots.Name: Red Squadron Veteran
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ablilty

Pilots.Name: "Blue Ace"
Pilots.PilotAbility: When performing a boost action, you may use the [ ^LEFTTURN 1] or [ ^RIGHTTURN 1] template.

Pilots.Name: "Snap" Wexley
Pilots.PilotAbility: After you execute a 2-, 3-, or 4-speed manoeuvre, if you are not touching a ship, you may perform a free boost action.

Pilots.Name: "Red Ace"
Pilots.PilotAbility: The first time you remove a shield token from your ship each round, assign 1 evade token to your ship.

Pilots.Name: Nien Nunb
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you receive a stress token, if there is an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1, you may discard that stress token.

Pilots.Name: Ello Asty
Pilots.PilotAbility: While you are not stressed, you may treat your ^LEFTTALONROLL and ^RIGHTTALONROLL manoeuvres as white manoeuvres.

Pilots.Name: Poe Dameron
Pilots.PilotAbility: While attacking or defending, if you have a focus token, you may change 1 of your ^FOCUS results to a ^HIT or ^EVADE result.

Pilots.Name: Poe Dameron
Pilots.PilotAbility: While attacking or defending, if you have a focus token, you may change 1 of your ^FOCUS results to a ^HIT or ^EVADE result.

Pilots.Name: Rookie Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ability

Pilots.Name: Red Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ability

Pilots.Name: Tarn Mison
Pilots.PilotAbility: When an enemy ship declares you as the target of an attack, you may acquire a target lock on that ship.

Pilots.Name: "Hobbie" Klivian
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you acquire or spend a target lock, you may remove 1 stress token from your ship.

Pilots.Name: Biggs Darklighter
Pilots.PilotAbility: Other friendly ships at Range 1 cannot be targeted by attacks if the attacker could target you instead.

Pilots.Name: Garven Dreis
Pilots.PilotAbility: After spending a focus token, you may place that token on any other friendly ship at Range 1-2 (instead of discarding it).

Pilots.Name: Jek Prokins
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you receive a stress token, you may remove it and roll 1 attack die. On a ^HIT result, deal 1 facedown damage card to this ship.

Pilots.Name: Luke Skywalker
Pilots.PilotAbility: When defending, you may change 1 of your ^FOCUS results to a ^EVADE result.

Pilots.Name: Wedge Antilles
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking, reduce the defender's agility value by 1 (to a minimum of 0)

Pilots.Name: Wes Janson
Pilots.PilotAbility: After you perform an attack, you may remove 1 focus, evade or blue target lock token from the defender.

Pilots.Name: Horton Salm
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may reroll any of your blank results.

Pilots.Name: "Dutch" Vandar
Pilots.PilotAbility: After acquiring a target lock, choose another friendly ship at Range 1-2. The ship may immediately acquire a target lock.

Pilots.Name: Gray Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ablilty

Pilots.Name: Gold Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ablilty

Pilots.Name: Airen Cracken
Pilots.PilotAbility: After you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at Range 1. That ship may perform 1 free action.

Pilots.Name: Lieutenant Blount
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking, the defender is hit by your attack, even if he does not suffer any damage.

Pilots.Name: Tala Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ability

Pilots.Name: Bandit Squadron Pilot
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ability

Pilots.Name: Cassian Amdor
Pilots.PilotAbility: At the start of the Activation phase, you may remove 1 stress token from 1 other friendly ship at Range 1-2.

Pilots.Name: Bodhi Rook
Pilots.PilotAbility: When a friendly ship acquires a target lock, that ship can lock onto an enemy ship at Range 1-3 of any friendly ship.

Pilots.Name: Heff Tobber
Pilots.PilotAbility: After an enemy ship executes a manoeuvre that causes it to overlap your ship, you may perform a free action.

Pilots.Name: Blue Squadron Pathfinder
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ability

Pilots.Name: Hera Syndulla
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you reveal a green or red manoeuvre, you may rotate your dial to another manoeuvre of the same difficulty.

Pilots.Name: Kanan Jarrus
Pilots.PilotAbility: When an enemy ship at Range 1-2 is attacking, you may spend a focus token. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 less attack die.

Pilots.Name: "Chopper"
Pilots.PilotAbility: At the start of the Combat phase, each enemy ship you are touching receives 1 stress token.

Pilots.Name: Lothal Rebel
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ability

Pilots.Name: Han Solo (HOTR)
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you are placed during setup, you can be placed anywhere in the play area beyond Range 3 of enemy ships.

Pilots.Name: Han Solo
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking, you may reroll all of your dice. If you choose to do so, you must reroll as many of your dice as possible.

Pilots.Name: Rey
Pilots.PilotAbility: When attacking or defending, if the enemy ship is inside your firing arc, you may reroll up to 2 of your blank results.

Pilots.Name: Lando Calrissian
Pilots.PilotAbility: After you execute a green manoeuvre, choose one other friendly ship at Range 1. That ship may perform 1 free action on its action bar.

Pilots.Name: Chewbacca (HOTR)
Pilots.PilotAbility: After another friendly ship at Range 1-3 is destroyed (but has not fled the battlefield), you may perform an attack.

Pilots.Name: Chewbacca
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you are dealt a faceup damage card, immediately flip it facedown (without resolving its ability).

Pilots.Name: Resistance Sympathizer
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ability

Pilots.Name: Outer Rim Smuggler
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ability

Pilots.Name: Dash Rendar
Pilots.PilotAbility: You may ignore obstacles during the Activation phase and when performing actions.

Pilots.Name: "Leebo"
Pilots.PilotAbility: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, draw 1 additional Damage card, choose 1 to resolve and discard the other.

Pilots.Name: Eaden Vrill
Pilots.PilotAbility: When performing a primary weapon attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack dice.

Pilots.Name: Wild Space Fringer
Pilots.PilotAbility: No pilot ability
